title: "Session Info"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%F %T %Z')`"
output: html_document
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---

```{r session_info}
source("helpers.R")
library(tibble)

sess <- devtools::session_info()

sess$platform %>% unclass %>% 
  as_tibble %>% t %>% as.data.frame %>% 
  rownames_to_column %>% as_tibble %>%
  set_names(c("Key", "Value")) %>%
  kable

sess$packages %>% unclass %>% as.data.frame %>% 
  set_names(c("Package", "Loaded", "Version", "Date", "Source")) %>%
  filter(Loaded == "*", !(Package %in% c("base", getOption("defaultPackages")))) %>% 
  select(-Loaded) %>%
  kable
```
